text.section:
A person is guilty of manufacturing methamphetamine when he knowingly and unlawfully:
Manufactures methamphetamine; or
With intent to manufacture methamphetamine possesses two (2) or more chemicals or two (2) or more items of equipment for the manufacture of methamphetamine.
Manufacture of methamphetamine is a Class B felony for the first offense and a Class A felony for a second or subsequent offense.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 9, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 59, effective July 15, 1998.
